titleStmt.title: A true copie of a speech spoken to His sacred Majestie, Charles the Second in St. Paul's Church-yard, as His Majestie passed from the Tower of London to White-hall the day before his royall coronation, April 22d, 1661. By James Hewlett, one of the children now remaining in Christ Hospitall.
titleStmt.author: Hewlett, James, b. 1644 or 5.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
